Html:
I might just be missing something incredibly obvious here but I cant find the drop down box that people keep mentioning. The one you select the new referencing style on... can somebody explain where it is? (Word 2007)

Thanks...

Max.

It's on the "References" tab in the "Citations & Bibliography" group. If you can't find it there, then some add-in might have suppressed it. EndNote is known to do this because they are scared of any competition.

The easiest workaround is to either temporarely disable the add-in causing the issue or to add the citations and bibliography group to the quick access toolbar (QAT).
Oh yeah, I just didnt see it. Thanks for the help :)
